Created for Spatial Analysis Class
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load packages, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggspatial)
library(ggthemes)
library(raster)
```

```{r st_read, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}

playgrounds <- st_read("playgrounds.geojson")
neighborhoods <- st_read("BOUNDARY_CDDNeighborhoods.shp.zip")
recreations <- st_read("recreation.kml")

```

## Including Plots

```{r cambridge_plot test, echo=FALSE}

cambridge_plot <- ggplot() +
  annotation_map_tile(zoomin = 0, progress = "none", type = "stamenbw", alpha = 0.25) +
  labs(caption = "Generated by Alex Cardelle. Map tiles by Stamen Design. Data by OpenStreetMap") +
geom_sf(data = neighborhoods, color = "green", alpha = 1) +
geom_sf(data = recreations, color = "darkorchid3") +
geom_sf(data = playgrounds, shape = 23, size = 3, aes(fill = "Playgrounds")) +
scale_fill_manual(values = "orange", name = "") +
theme_map()

  
cambridge_plot
```
```{r eval=FALSE, color_test, echo=FALSE}

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = playgrounds, alpha = 0.5,
          aes(fill = "Historic District")) +
  geom_sf(data = neighborhoods) +
  geom_sf(data = recreations, color = "green") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = "blue", name = "") 

```
